 1199: 
 1200: op(Father, Mod, Fun, Args) -> 
 1201:     Res = apply(Mod, Fun, Args),
 1202:     Father ! {self(), Res}.
 1203: 
 1204: insert(_Tab, 0) -> ok;
 1205: insert(Tab, N) when N > 0 ->
 1206:     ok = mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, N, N, 0}) end),
 1207:     insert(Tab, N-1).
 1208: 
 1209: 
 1210: update_own(Tab, Key, Acc) ->
 1211:     Update = 
 1212: 	fun() -> 
 1213: 		Res = mnesia:read({Tab, Key}),
 1214: 		case Res of 
 1215: 		    [{Tab, Key, Extra, Acc}] ->
 1216: 			mnesia:write({Tab,Key,Extra, Acc+1});
 1217: 		    Val ->
 1218: 			{read, Val, {acc, Acc}}
 1219: 		end
 1220: 	end,
 1221:     receive 
 1222: 	{Pid, quit} -> Pid ! {self(), Acc}
 1223:     after
 1224: 	0 -> 
 1225: 	    case mnesia:transaction(Update) of
 1226: 		{atomic, ok} -> 	    
 1227: 		    update_own(Tab, Key, Acc+1);
 1228: 		Else -> 
 1229: 		    ?error("Trans failed on ~p with ~p~n"
 1230: 			   "Info w2read ~p w2write ~p w2commit ~p storage ~p ~n", 
 1231: 			   [node(), 
 1232: 			    Else,
 1233: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read),
 1234: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write),
 1235: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_commit),
 1236: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, storage_type)])
 1237: 	    end
 1238:     end.
 1239: 
 1240: update_shared(Tab, Me, Acc) ->
 1241:     Update = 
 1242: 	fun() ->
 1243: 		W2R = mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read),
 1244: 		Res = mnesia:read({Tab, 0}),
 1245: 		case Res of 
 1246: 		    [{Tab, Key, Extra, Val}] when element(Me, Extra) == Acc ->
 1247: 			Extra1 = setelement(Me, Extra, Acc+1),
 1248: 			Term = {Tab, Key, Extra1, Val+1},
 1249: 			ok = mnesia:write(Term),
 1250: %			?log("At ~p: ~p w2r ~p w2w ~p ~n", 
 1251: %			     [node(), Term, 
 1252: %			      mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read),
 1253: 			W2W = mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write),
 1254: 			W2C = mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_commit),
 1255: %%			      mnesia:table_info(Tab, storage_type)
 1256: %			     ]),
 1257: 			{_Mod, Tid, Ts} = get(mnesia_activity_state),
 1258: 			io:format("~p ~p~n", [Tid, ets:tab2list(element(2,Ts))]),
 1259: 			{ok,Term,{W2R,W2W,W2C}};
 1260: 		    Val ->
 1261: 			Info = [{acc, Acc}, {me, Me}, 
 1262: 				{tid, element(2, mnesia:get_activity_id())},
 1263: 				{locks, mnesia:system_info(held_locks)}],
 1264: 			{read, Val, Info}
 1265: 		end
 1266: 	end,
 1267:     receive 
 1268: 	{Pid, quit} -> Pid ! {self(), Acc}
 1269:     after
 1270: 	0 -> 
 1271: 	    case mnesia:transaction(Update) of
 1272: 		{atomic, {ok,Term,W2}} ->
 1273: 		    io:format("~p:~p:(~p,~p) ~w@~w~n",
 1274: 			      [erlang:unique_integer([monotonic,positive]),
 1275: 			       node(),Me,Acc,Term,W2]),
 1276: 		    update_shared(Tab, Me, Acc+1);
 1277: 		Else -> 
 1278: 		    ?error("Trans failed on ~p with ~p~n"
 1279: 			   "Info w2read ~p w2write ~p w2commit ~p storage ~p ~n", 
 1280: 			   [node(), 
 1281: 			    Else,
 1282: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read),
 1283: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write),
 1284: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_commit),
 1285: 			    mnesia:table_info(Tab, storage_type)			   
 1286: 			   ])
 1287: 	    end
 1288:     end.
 1289: 
 1290: init_admin(Def, N1, N2, N3) ->
 1291:     Tab = schema_ops,
 1292:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1293:     insert(Tab, 1002),
 1294:     
 1295:     Pid1 = spawn_link(N1, ?MODULE, update_own, [Tab, 1, 0]),
 1296:     Pid2 = spawn_link(N2, ?MODULE, update_own, [Tab, 2, 0]),
 1297:     Pid3 = spawn_link(N3, ?MODULE, update_own, [Tab, 3, 0]),
 1298:     
 1299:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1300: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 0, {0,0,0}, 0}) end)),
 1301: 
 1302:     Pid4 = spawn_link(N1, ?MODULE, update_shared, [Tab, 1, 0]),
 1303:     Pid5 = spawn_link(N2, ?MODULE, update_shared, [Tab, 2, 0]),
 1304:     Pid6 = spawn_link(N3, ?MODULE, update_shared, [Tab, 3, 0]),
 1305:     
 1306:     {Pid1, Pid2, Pid3, Pid4, Pid5, Pid6}.
 1307: 
 1308: verify_results({P1, P2, P3, P4, P5, P6}) ->
 1309:     Tab = schema_ops, N1 = node(P1),  N2 = node(P2),  N3 = node(P3),
 1310: 
 1311:     try 
 1312: 	P1 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1313: 	R1 = receive {P1, Res1} -> Res1 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P1}) end,
 1314: 	P2 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1315: 	R2 = receive {P2, Res2} -> Res2 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P2}) end,
 1316: 	P3 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1317: 	R3 = receive {P3, Res3} -> Res3 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P3}) end,
 1318: 
 1319: 	P4 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1320: 	R4 = receive {P4, Res4} -> Res4 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P4}) end,
 1321: 	P5 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1322: 	R5 = receive {P5, Res5} -> Res5 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P5}) end,
 1323: 	P6 ! {self(), quit}, 
 1324: 	R6 = receive {P6, Res6} -> Res6 after 9000 -> throw({timeout,P6}) end,
 1325: 
 1326: 	?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab) end)),
 1327: 	?log("Should be ~p~n", [R1]),
 1328: 	?match([{_, _, _, R1}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1329: 	?match([{_, _, _, R1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1330: 	?match([{_, _, _, R1}], rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 1}])),
 1331: 	?log("Should be ~p~n", [R2]),
 1332: 	?match([{_, _, _, R2}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 2}])),
 1333: 	?match([{_, _, _, R2}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 2}])),
 1334: 	?match([{_, _, _, R2}], rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 2}])),
 1335: 	?log("Should be ~p~n", [R3]),
 1336: 	?match([{_, _, _, R3}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 3}])),
 1337: 	?match([{_, _, _, R3}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 3}])),
 1338: 	?match([{_, _, _, R3}], rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 3}])),
 1339: 
 1340: 	Res = R4+R5+R6,
 1341: 	?log("Should be {~p+~p+~p}= ~p~n", [R4, R5, R6, Res]),
 1342: 	?match([{_, _, {R4,R5,R6}, Res}], rpc:call(N1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 0}])),
 1343: 	?match([{_, _, {R4,R5,R6}, Res}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 0}])),
 1344: 	?match([{_, _, {R4,R5,R6}, Res}], rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab, 0}]))
 1345:     catch throw:{timeout, Pid}  ->
 1346: 	    mnesia_lib:dist_coredump(),
 1347: 	    ?error("Timeout ~p ~n", [Pid])
 1348:     end.
 1349:     
 1350: 
 1351: get_info(Tab) ->
 1352:     Info = mnesia:table_info(Tab, all),
 1353:     mnesia_lib:verbose("~p~n", [Info]).
 1354: 
 1355: del_table_copy_1(suite) -> [];
 1356: del_table_copy_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1357:     [_Node1, Node2, _Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1358:     del_table(Node2, Node2, Nodes). %Called on same Node as deleted
 1359: del_table_copy_2(suite) -> [];
 1360: del_table_copy_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1361:     [Node1, Node2, _Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1362:     del_table(Node1, Node2, Nodes). %Called from other Node 
 1363: del_table_copy_3(suite) -> [];
 1364: del_table_copy_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1365:     [_Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1366:     del_table(Node3, Node2, Nodes). %Called from Node w.o. table
 1367: 
 1368: %%% The actual test
 1369: del_table(CallFrom, DelNode, [Node1, Node2, Node3]) ->
 1370:     Def = [{ram_copies, [Node1]}, {disc_copies, [Node2]}, 
 1371: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}],
 1372:     Tab = schema_ops,
 1373:     Pids = init_admin(Def, Node1, Node2, Node3),
 1374: 
 1375:     ?log("Call from ~p delete table from ~p ~n", [CallFrom, DelNode]),
 1376:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1377:     
 1378:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1379: 	   rpc:call(CallFrom, mnesia, del_table_copy, [Tab, DelNode])),
 1380: 
 1381:     verify_results(Pids),
 1382:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1383:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node2, Node3], []).    
 1384: 
 1385: add_table_copy_1(suite) -> [];
 1386: add_table_copy_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1387:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1388:     Def = [{disc_only_copies, [Node1, Node2]}, 
 1389: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1390:     add_table(Node1, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1391: add_table_copy_2(suite) -> [];
 1392: add_table_copy_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1393:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1394:     Def = [{disc_only_copies, [Node1, Node2]}, 
 1395: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1396:     add_table(Node2, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1397: add_table_copy_3(suite) -> [];
 1398: add_table_copy_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1399:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1400:     Def = [{disc_only_copies, [Node1, Node2]},
 1401: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1402:     add_table(Node3, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1403: add_table_copy_4(suite) -> [];
 1404: add_table_copy_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1405:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1406:     Def = [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1407: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1408:     add_table(Node2, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1409: %%% The actual test
 1410: add_table(CallFrom, AddNode, [Node1, Node2, Node3], Def) ->
 1411:     Pids = init_admin(Def, Node1, Node2, Node3),    
 1412:     Tab = schema_ops,
 1413:     ?log("Call from ~p add table to ~p ~n", [CallFrom, AddNode]),
 1414:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1415:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(CallFrom, mnesia, add_table_copy, 
 1416: 				  [Tab, AddNode, ram_copies])),
 1417:     verify_results(Pids),
 1418:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1419:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node2, Node3], []).
 1420: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1421: move_table_copy_1(suite) -> [];
 1422: move_table_copy_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1423:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1424:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]},
 1425: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1426:     move_table(Node1, Node1, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1427: move_table_copy_2(suite) -> [];
 1428: move_table_copy_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1429:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1430:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]},
 1431: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1432:     move_table(Node2, Node1, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1433: move_table_copy_3(suite) -> [];
 1434: move_table_copy_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1435:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1436:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]},
 1437: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1438:     move_table(Node3, Node1, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1439: move_table_copy_4(suite) -> [];
 1440: move_table_copy_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1441:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1442:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]},
 1443: 	   {attributes, [key, attr1, attr2]}], 
 1444:     move_table(Node2, Node1, Node3, Nodes, Def).
 1445: %%% The actual test
 1446: move_table(CallFrom, FromNode, ToNode, [Node1, Node2, Node3], Def) ->
 1447:     Pids = init_admin(Def, Node1, Node2, Node3),    
 1448:     Tab = schema_ops,   
 1449:     ?log("Call from ~p move table from ~p to ~p ~n", [CallFrom, FromNode, ToNode]),
 1450:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1451:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(CallFrom, mnesia, move_table_copy, 
 1452: 				  [Tab, FromNode, ToNode])),
 1453:     verify_results(Pids),
 1454:     rpc:multicall([Node1, Node2, Node3], ?MODULE, get_info, [Tab]),
 1455:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node2, Node3], []).
 1456: 
 1457: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1458: 
 1459: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1460: dirty_updates_visible_direct(doc) ->
 1461:     ["One process can immediately see dirty updates of another"];
 1462: dirty_updates_visible_direct(suite) -> [];
 1463: dirty_updates_visible_direct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1464:     dirty_visibility(outside_trans, Config).
 1465: 
 1466: dirty_reads_regardless_of_trans(doc) ->
 1467:     ["Dirty reads are not affected by transaction context"];
 1468: dirty_reads_regardless_of_trans(suite) -> [];
 1469: dirty_reads_regardless_of_trans(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1470:     dirty_visibility(inside_trans, Config).
 1471: 
 1472: dirty_visibility(Mode, Config) ->
 1473:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1474:     Tab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([dirty_visibility, '_', Mode])), 
 1475: 
 1476:    ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}])), 
 1477:     ValPos = 3, 
 1478: 
 1479:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1480:     
 1481:     %% Start two processes
 1482:     {success, [A]} = ?start_activities([Node1]), 
 1483: 
 1484:     case Mode of
 1485: 	inside_trans ->
 1486: 	    ?start_transactions([A]), 
 1487: 	    A ! fun() ->
 1488: 			mnesia:write({Tab, a, 11}), 
 1489: 			mnesia:write({Tab, b, 22}), 
 1490: 			mnesia:write({Tab, c, 1}), 
 1491: 			mnesia:write({Tab, d, 2}), 
 1492: 			mnesia:write({Tab, e, 3}), 
 1493: 			lists:sort(mnesia:all_keys(Tab))
 1494: 		end, 
 1495: 	    ?match_receive({A, [a, b, c, d, e]});
 1496: 	outside_trans ->
 1497: 	    ignore
 1498:     end, 
 1499: 
 1500:     RecA = {Tab, a, 1}, 
 1501:     PatA = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1502:     RecB = {Tab, b, 3}, 
 1503:     PatB = {Tab, '$1', 3}, 
 1504:     RecB2 = {Tab, b, 2}, 
 1505:     PatB2 = {Tab, '$1', 2}, 
 1506:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, a})), 
 1507:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, b})), 
 1508:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatA)), 
 1509:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB)), 
 1510:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB2)), 
 1511:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1512:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1513:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1514:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1515:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB2, ValPos)), 
 1516:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)), 
 1517: 
 1518:     %% dirty_write
 1519:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:dirty_write(RecA) end, 
 1520:     ?match_receive({A, ok}), 
 1521:     ?match([RecA], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, a})), 
 1522:     ?match([RecA], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatA)), 
 1523:     ?match(a, mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)), 
 1524:     ?match([RecA], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1525:     ?match([RecA], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1526:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, a)), 
 1527: 
 1528:     %% dirty_create
 1529:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:dirty_write(RecB) end, 
 1530:     ?match_receive({A, ok}), 
 1531:     ?match([RecB], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, b})), 
 1532:     ?match([RecB], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB)), 
 1533:     ?match([RecB], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1534:     ?match([RecB], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1535:     ?match('$end_of_table', 
 1536: 	   mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)))), 
 1537:     
 1538:     %% dirty_update_counter
 1539:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab, b}, -1) end, 
 1540:     ?match_receive({A, _}), 
 1541:     ?match([RecB2], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, b})), 
 1542:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB)), 
 1543:     ?match([RecB2], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB2)), 
 1544:     ?match([RecB2], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1545:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1546:     ?match([RecB2], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB2, ValPos)), 
 1547:     ?match('$end_of_table', 
 1548: 	   mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)))), 
 1549: 
 1550:     %% dirty_delete
 1551:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab, b}) end, 
 1552:     ?match_receive({A, ok}), 
 1553:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, b})), 
 1554:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB2)), 
 1555:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1556:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB2, ValPos)), 
 1557:     ?match(a, mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)), 
 1558:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:dirty_next(Tab, a)), 
 1559: 
 1560:     %% dirty_delete_object
 1561:     ?match([RecA], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatA)), 
 1562:     A ! fun() -> mnesia:dirty_delete_object(RecA) end, 
 1563:     ?match_receive({A, ok}), 
 1564:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, a})), 
 1565:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatA)), 
 1566:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1567:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1568:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:dirty_first(Tab)), 
 1569:     
 1570:     case Mode of
 1571: 	inside_trans ->
 1572: 	    A ! end_trans, 
 1573: 	    ?match_receive({A, {atomic, end_trans}});
 1574: 	outside_trans ->
 1575: 	    ignore
 1576:     end, 
 1577:     ok.
 1578: 
 1579: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1580: trans_update_invisibible_outside_trans(doc) ->
 1581:     ["Updates in a transaction are invisible outside the transaction"];
 1582: trans_update_invisibible_outside_trans(suite) -> [];
 1583: trans_update_invisibible_outside_trans(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1584:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1585:     Tab = trans_update_invisibible_outside_trans, 
 1586: 
 1587:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1588: 					     {ram_copies, [Node1]}])), 
 1589:     ValPos = 3, 
 1590:     RecA = {Tab, a, 1}, 
 1591:     PatA = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1592:     RecB = {Tab, b, 3}, 
 1593:     PatB = {Tab, '$1', 3}, 
 1594:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1595: 
 1596:     Verify =
 1597: 	fun() ->
 1598: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, a})), 
 1599: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, b})), 
 1600: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatA)), 
 1601: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(PatB)), 
 1602: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1603: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1604: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1605: 		?match([], mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1606: 		?match('$end_of_table', mnesia:dirty_first(Tab))
 1607: 	     end, 
 1608: 
 1609:     Fun = fun() ->
 1610: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA)), 
 1611: 		  Verify(), 
 1612: 
 1613: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecB)), 
 1614: 		  Verify(), 
 1615: 
 1616: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete({Tab, b})), 
 1617: 		  Verify(), 
 1618: 		  
 1619: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:match_object(PatA)), 
 1620: 		  Verify(), 
 1621: 
 1622: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_object(RecA)), 
 1623: 		  Verify(), 
 1624: 		  ok
 1625: 	  end, 
 1626:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun)), 
 1627:     Verify(), 
 1628:     ok.
 1629: 
 1630: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1631: trans_update_visible_inside_trans(doc) ->
 1632:     ["Updates in a transaction are visible in the same transaction"];
 1633: trans_update_visible_inside_trans(suite) -> [];
 1634: trans_update_visible_inside_trans(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1635:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1636:     Tab = trans_update_visible_inside_trans, 
 1637: 
 1638:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1639: 					     {ram_copies, [Node1]}])), 
 1640:     ValPos = 3, 
 1641:     RecA = {Tab, a, 1},
 1642:     RecA2 = {Tab, a, 2},
 1643:     PatA = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1644:     RecB = {Tab, b, 3}, 
 1645:     PatB = {Tab, '$1', 3}, 
 1646:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1647: 
 1648:     Fun = fun() ->
 1649: 		  %% write
 1650: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA)), 
 1651: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1652: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1653: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:match_object(PatA)), 
 1654: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1655: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1656: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1657: 
 1658: 		  %% create
 1659: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecB)), 
 1660: 		  ?match([RecB], mnesia:read({Tab, b})), 
 1661: 		  ?match([RecB], mnesia:wread({Tab, b})), 
 1662: 		  ?match([RecB], mnesia:match_object(PatB)), 
 1663: 		  ?match([RecB], mnesia:index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1664: 		  ?match([RecB], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1665: 		  
 1666: 		  %% delete
 1667: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete({Tab, b})), 
 1668: 		  ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, b})), 
 1669: 		  ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, b})), 
 1670: 		  ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatB)), 
 1671: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1672: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatB, ValPos)), 
 1673: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1674: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1675: 
 1676: 		  %% delete_object
 1677: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_object(RecA2)),
 1678: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:read({Tab, a})),
 1679: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})),
 1680: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:match_object(PatA)),
 1681: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)),
 1682: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)),
 1683: 		  ?match([RecA], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)),
 1684: 
 1685: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_object(RecA)), 
 1686: 		  ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1687: 		  ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1688: 		  ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatA)), 
 1689: 		  ?match([], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1690: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA, ValPos)), 
 1691: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1692: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 3, ValPos)), 
 1693: 		  ok
 1694: 	  end, 
 1695:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun)), 
 1696:     ok.
 1697: 
 1698: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1699: write_shadows(doc) ->
 1700:     ["Tests whether the shadow shows the correct object when",
 1701:      "writing to the table"];
 1702: write_shadows(suite) -> [];
 1703: write_shadows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1704:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1705:     Tab = write_shadows, 
 1706: 
 1707:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1708: 					     {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1709: 					     {type,  set}])), 
 1710:     ValPos = 3, 
 1711:     RecA1 = {Tab, a, 1}, 
 1712:     PatA1 = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1713:     RecA2 = {Tab, a, 2}, 
 1714:     PatA2 = {Tab, '$1', 2}, 
 1715: 
 1716: 
 1717:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1718:        
 1719:     Fun1 = fun() ->
 1720: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA1)), 
 1721: 		   ok
 1722: 	   end, 
 1723: 
 1724:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun1)), 
 1725: 
 1726:     Fun2 = fun() ->
 1727: 		  %% write shadow old write - is the confirmed value visible
 1728: 		  %%                          in the shadow ?
 1729: 		  ?match([RecA1], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1730: 		  ?match([RecA1], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1731: 		  ?match([RecA1], mnesia:match_object(PatA1)), 
 1732: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1733: 		  ?match([RecA1], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA1, ValPos)), 
 1734: 		  ?match([RecA1], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1735: 
 1736: 		  %% write shadow new write - is a new value visible instead
 1737: 		  %%                          of the old value ?
 1738: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA2)), 
 1739: 
 1740: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1741: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1742: 		   ?match([],      mnesia:match_object(PatA1)), %% delete shadow old but not new write
 1743: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), %% is the new value visible
 1744: 
 1745: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1746: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)), 
 1747: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1748: 		  ok
 1749: 
 1750: 	  end, 
 1751:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun2)), 
 1752:     ok.
 1753: 
 1754: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1755: delete_shadows(doc) ->
 1756:     ["Test whether the shadow shows the correct object when deleting objects"];
 1757: delete_shadows(suite) -> [];
 1758: delete_shadows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1759:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1760:     Tab = delete_shadows, 
 1761: 
 1762:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1763: 					     {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1764: 					     {type,  set}])), 
 1765:     ValPos = 3, 
 1766:     OidA  = {Tab, a}, 
 1767:     RecA1 = {Tab, a, 1}, 
 1768:     PatA1 = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1769:     RecA2 = {Tab, a, 2}, 
 1770:     PatA2 = {Tab, '$1', 2}, 
 1771: 
 1772: 
 1773:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1774:        
 1775:     Fun1 = fun() ->
 1776: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA1)), 
 1777: 		   ok
 1778: 	   end, 
 1779: 
 1780:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun1)), 
 1781: 
 1782:     Fun2 = fun() ->
 1783: 		   
 1784: 		   
 1785: 		  %% delete shadow old write - is the confirmed value invisible
 1786: 		  %%                           when deleted in the transaction ?
 1787: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete(OidA)), 
 1788: 
 1789: 		  ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1790: 		  ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1791: 		  ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatA1)), 
 1792: 		  ?match([], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1793: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA1, ValPos)), 
 1794: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1795: 
 1796: 		  %% delete shadow old but not new write - is the new value visible
 1797: 		  %%                           when the old one was deleted ?
 1798: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA2)), 
 1799: 
 1800: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1801: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1802: 		  ?match([],  mnesia:match_object(PatA1)),
 1803: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), 
 1804: 		  ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1805: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)), 
 1806: 		  ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1807: 	
 1808: 		   %% delete shadow old and new write - is the new value invisable
 1809: 		  %%                           when deleted ?
 1810: 		  ?match(ok, mnesia:delete(OidA)), 
 1811: 
 1812: 		  ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1813: 		  ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1814: 		  ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), 
 1815: 		  ?match([], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1816: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)), 
 1817: 		  ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1818: 		  ok
 1819: 
 1820: 	  end, 
 1821:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun2)), 
 1822:     ok.
 1823: 
 1824: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1825: write_delete_shadows_bag(doc) ->
 1826:     ["Test the visibility of written and deleted objects in an bag type table"];
 1827: write_delete_shadows_bag(suite) -> [];
 1828: write_delete_shadows_bag(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1829:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1830:     Tab = write_delete_shadows_bag, 
 1831: 
 1832:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1833: 					       {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1834: 					       {type,  bag}])), 
 1835:     ValPos = 3, 
 1836:     OidA  = {Tab, a}, 
 1837: 
 1838:     RecA1 = {Tab, a, 1}, 
 1839:     PatA1 = {Tab, '$1', 1}, 
 1840: 
 1841:     RecA2 = {Tab, a, 2}, 
 1842:     PatA2 = {Tab, '$1', 2}, 
 1843: 
 1844:     RecA3 = {Tab, a, 3}, 
 1845:     PatA3 = {Tab, '$1', 3}, 
 1846: 
 1847:     PatA  = {Tab, a, '_'}, 
 1848: 
 1849: 
 1850:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:add_table_index(Tab, ValPos)), 
 1851: 
 1852:     Fun1 = fun() ->
 1853: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA1)), 
 1854: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA2)), 
 1855: 		   ok
 1856: 	   end, 
 1857: 
 1858:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun1)), 
 1859: 
 1860:     Fun2 = fun() ->		   		   
 1861: 		   %% delete shadow old write - is the confirmed value invisible
 1862: 		   %%                           when deleted in the transaction ?
 1863: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_object(RecA1)), 
 1864: 
 1865: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1866: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1867: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), 
 1868: 		   ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1869: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)), 
 1870: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1871: 
 1872: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:delete(OidA)), 
 1873: 
 1874: 		   ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1875: 		   ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1876: 		   ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatA1)), 
 1877: 		   ?match([], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1878: 		   ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA1, ValPos)), 
 1879: 		   ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 1, ValPos)), 
 1880: 
 1881: 		   %% delete shadow old but not new write - are both new value visible
 1882: 		   %%                           when the old one was deleted ?
 1883: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA2)), 
 1884: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:write(RecA3)), 
 1885: 
 1886: 
 1887: 		   ?match([RecA2, RecA3], lists:sort(mnesia:read({Tab, a}))), 
 1888: 		   ?match([RecA2, RecA3], lists:sort(mnesia:wread({Tab, a}))), 
 1889: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), 
 1890: 		   ?match([a], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1891: 		   ?match([RecA2, RecA3], lists:sort(mnesia:match_object(PatA))),
 1892: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)),
 1893: 		   ?match([RecA3], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA3, ValPos)),
 1894: 		   ?match([RecA2], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1895: 
 1896: 		   %% delete shadow old and new write - is the new value invisable
 1897: 		   %%                           when deleted ?
 1898: 		   ?match(ok, mnesia:delete(OidA)), 
 1899: 
 1900: 		   ?match([], mnesia:read({Tab, a})), 
 1901: 		   ?match([], mnesia:wread({Tab, a})), 
 1902: 		   ?match([], mnesia:match_object(PatA2)), 
 1903: 		   ?match([], mnesia:all_keys(Tab)), 
 1904: 		   ?match([], mnesia:index_match_object(PatA2, ValPos)), 
 1905: 		   ?match([], mnesia:index_read(Tab, 2, ValPos)), 
 1906: 		   ok
 1907: 	   end, 
 1908:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Fun2)), 
 1909:     ok.
 1910: 
 1911: write_delete_shadows_bag2(doc) ->
 1912:     ["Test the visibility of written and deleted objects in an bag type table " 
 1913:      "and verifies the results"];
 1914: write_delete_shadows_bag2(suite) -> [];
 1915: write_delete_shadows_bag2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1916: 
 1917:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1918:     Tab = w_d_s_b, 
 1919: 
 1920:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, 
 1921: 					       {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1922: 					       {type,  bag}])),     
 1923:     Del = fun() ->
 1924: 		  R1 = mnesia:read({Tab, 1}),
 1925: 		  mnesia:delete({Tab, 1}),
 1926: 		  R2 = mnesia:read({Tab, 1}),
 1927: 		  mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 1}),
 1928: 		  mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 2}),
 1929: 		  R3 = mnesia:read({Tab, 1}),
 1930: 		  {R1, R2, R3}
 1931: 	  end,
 1932:     DelObj = fun() ->
 1933: 		     R1 = mnesia:read({Tab, 2}),
 1934: 		     mnesia:delete_object({Tab, 2, 2}),
 1935: 		     R2 = mnesia:read({Tab, 2}),
 1936: 		     mnesia:write({Tab, 2, 1}),
 1937: 		     mnesia:write({Tab, 2, 2}),
 1938: 		     R3 = mnesia:read({Tab, 2}),
 1939: 		     {R1, R2, R3}
 1940: 	     end,
 1941:     Both1 = [{Tab, 1, 1}, {Tab, 1, 2}],   
 1942:     Both2 = [{Tab, 2, 1}, {Tab, 2, 2}],   
 1943:     ?match({atomic, {[], [], Both1}}, mnesia:transaction(Del)),
 1944:     ?match({atomic, {Both1, [], Both1}}, mnesia:transaction(Del)),
 1945:     ?match({atomic, Both1}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end)),
 1946:     ?match({atomic, {[], [], Both2}}, mnesia:transaction(DelObj)),
 1947:     ?match({atomic, {Both2, [{Tab, 2, 1}], Both2}}, mnesia:transaction(DelObj)),
 1948:     ?match({atomic, Both2}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 2}) end)),
 1949:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
 1950: 
 1951: shadow_search(doc) ->
 1952:     ["Verifies that ordered_set tables are ordered, and the order is kept" 
 1953:      "even when table is shadowed by transaction updates"];
 1954: shadow_search(suite) -> [];
 1955: shadow_search(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1956:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config), 
 1957:     Tab1  = ss_oset,
 1958:     Tab2 = ss_set,
 1959:     Tab3 = ss_bag,
 1960:     Tabs = [Tab1,Tab2,Tab3],
 1961:     RecName = ss,
 1962:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab1}, 
 1963: 					       {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1964: 					       {record_name, RecName},
 1965: 					       {type,  ordered_set}])),
 1966:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab2},
 1967: 					       {record_name, RecName},
 1968: 					       {ram_copies, [Node1]},
 1969: 					       {type,  set}])),
 1970:     ?match({atomic, ok},  mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab3},
 1971: 					       {record_name, RecName},
 1972: 					       {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1973: 					       {type,  bag}])),
 1974:     Recs = [{RecName, K, K} || K <- [1,3,5]],
 1975:     [mnesia:dirty_write(Tab1, R) || R <- Recs],
 1976:     [mnesia:dirty_write(Tab2, R) || R <- Recs],
 1977:     [mnesia:dirty_write(Tab3, R) || R <- Recs],
 1978:     
 1979:     Match  = fun(Tab) -> mnesia:match_object(Tab, {'_','_','_'}, write) end,
 1980:     Select = fun(Tab) -> mnesia:select(Tab, [{'_', [], ['$_']}]) end,
 1981: %    Trans = fun(Fun,Args) -> mnesia:transaction(Fun,Args) end,
 1982:     LoopHelp = fun('$end_of_table',_) -> [];
 1983: 		  ({Res,Cont},Fun) -> 
 1984: 		       Sel = mnesia:select(Cont),
 1985: 		       Res ++ Fun(Sel, Fun)
 1986: 	       end,
 1987:     SelLoop = fun(Table) -> 
 1988: 		      Sel = mnesia:select(Table, [{'_', [], ['$_']}], 1, read),
 1989: 		      LoopHelp(Sel,LoopHelp)
 1990: 	      end,
 1991:     
 1992:     R1 = {RecName, 2, 2}, R2 = {RecName, 4, 4},
 1993:     R3 = {RecName, 2, 3}, R4 = {RecName, 3, 1},
 1994:     R5 = {RecName, 104, 104},
 1995:     W1 = fun(Tab,Search) -> mnesia:write(Tab,R1,write),
 1996: 			    mnesia:write(Tab,R2,write), 
 1997: 			    Search(Tab)
 1998: 	 end,
 1999:     S1 = lists:sort([R1,R2|Recs]),
 2000:     ?match({atomic,S1}, mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab1,Select])),
 2001:     ?match({atomic,S1}, mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab1,Match])),
 2002:     ?match({atomic,S1}, mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab1,SelLoop])),
 2003:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab2,Select]))),
 2004:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab2,SelLoop]))),
 2005:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab2,Match]))),
 2006:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab3,Select]))),
 2007:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab3,SelLoop]))),
 2008:     ?match({atomic,S1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W1, [Tab3,Match]))),
 2009:     [mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab,R) || R <- [R1,R2], Tab <- Tabs],
 2010: 
 2011:     W2 = fun(Tab,Search) -> 
 2012: 		 mnesia:write(Tab,R3,write),
 2013: 		 mnesia:write(Tab,R1,write), 
 2014: 		 Search(Tab)
 2015: 	 end,
 2016:     S2 = lists:sort([R1|Recs]),
 2017:     S2Bag = lists:sort([R1,R3|Recs]),
 2018:     ?match({atomic,S2}, mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab1,Select])),
 2019:     ?match({atomic,S2}, mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab1,SelLoop])),
 2020:     ?match({atomic,S2}, mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab1,Match])),
 2021:     ?match({atomic,S2}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab2,Select]))),
 2022:     ?match({atomic,S2}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab2,SelLoop]))),
 2023:     ?match({atomic,S2}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab2,Match]))),
 2024:     ?match({atomic,S2Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab3,Select]))),
 2025:     ?match({atomic,S2Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab3,SelLoop]))),
 2026:     ?match({atomic,S2Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W2, [Tab3,Match]))),
 2027: %%    [mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab,R) || R <- [R1,R3], Tab <- Tabs],
 2028: 
 2029:     W3 = fun(Tab,Search) -> 
 2030: 		 mnesia:write(Tab,R4,write),
 2031: 		 mnesia:delete(Tab,element(2,R1),write), 
 2032: 		 Search(Tab)
 2033: 	 end,
 2034:     S3Bag = lists:sort([R4|lists:delete(R1,Recs)]),
 2035:     S3 = lists:delete({RecName,3,3},S3Bag),
 2036:     ?match({atomic,S3}, mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab1,Select])),
 2037:     ?match({atomic,S3}, mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab1,SelLoop])),
 2038:     ?match({atomic,S3}, mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab1,Match])),
 2039:     ?match({atomic,S3}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab2,SelLoop]))),
 2040:     ?match({atomic,S3}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab2,Select]))),
 2041:     ?match({atomic,S3}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab2,Match]))),
 2042:     ?match({atomic,S3Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab3,Select]))),
 2043:     ?match({atomic,S3Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab3,SelLoop]))),
 2044:     ?match({atomic,S3Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W3, [Tab3,Match]))),
 2045: 
 2046:     W4 = fun(Tab,Search) -> 
 2047: 		 mnesia:delete(Tab,-1,write),
 2048: 		 mnesia:delete(Tab,4 ,write),
 2049: 		 mnesia:delete(Tab,17,write),
 2050: 		 mnesia:delete_object(Tab,{RecName, -1, x},write),
 2051: 		 mnesia:delete_object(Tab,{RecName, 4, x},write),
 2052: 		 mnesia:delete_object(Tab,{RecName, 42, x},write),
 2053: 		 mnesia:delete_object(Tab,R2,write),
 2054: 		 mnesia:write(Tab, R5, write),
 2055: 		 Search(Tab)
 2056: 	 end,
 2057:     S4Bag = lists:sort([R5|S3Bag]),
 2058:     S4    = lists:sort([R5|S3]),
 2059:     ?match({atomic,S4}, mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab1,Select])),
 2060:     ?match({atomic,S4}, mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab1,SelLoop])),
 2061:     ?match({atomic,S4}, mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab1,Match])),
 2062:     ?match({atomic,S4}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab2,Select]))),
 2063:     ?match({atomic,S4}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab2,SelLoop]))),
 2064:     ?match({atomic,S4}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab2,Match]))),
 2065:     ?match({atomic,S4Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab3,Select]))),
 2066:     ?match({atomic,S4Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab3,SelLoop]))),
 2067:     ?match({atomic,S4Bag}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W4, [Tab3,Match]))),
 2068:     [mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab,R) || R <- [{RecName,3,3},R5], Tab <- Tabs],
 2069:         
 2070:     %% hmmm anything more??
 2071:     
 2072:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
 2073: 
 2074: 
 2075: rr_kill_copy(suite) -> [];
 2076: rr_kill_copy(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2077:     Ns = ?acquire_nodes(3,Config ++ [{tc_timeout, 60000}]),
 2078:     DeleteMe = fun(_Tab,Where2read) ->
 2079: 		       ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Where2read]))
 2080: 	       end,
 2081:     Del = removed_resources(Ns, DeleteMe),
 2082:     ?verify_mnesia(Ns -- [Del], []).
 2083: 
 2084: removed_resources([_N1,N2,N3], DeleteRes) ->
 2085:     Tab = del_res,
 2086:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab,[{ram_copies, [N2,N3]}])),
 2087:     
 2088:     Init = fun() -> [mnesia:write({Tab,Key,Key}) || Key <- lists:seq(0,99)] end,
 2089:     ?match([], [Bad || Bad <- mnesia:sync_dirty(Init), Bad /= ok]),
 2090:     
 2091:     Where2Read = mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read),
 2092:     [Keep]  = [N2,N3] -- [Where2Read],
 2093:     Tester = self(),
 2094:     
 2095:     Conflict = fun() -> 
 2096: 		       %% Read a value..
 2097: 		       [{Tab,1,Val}] = mnesia:read({Tab,1}),
 2098: 		       case get(restart) of
 2099: 			   undefined -> 
 2100: 			       Tester ! {pid_1, self()},
 2101: 			       %% Wait for sync, the read value have been 
 2102: 			       %% updated and this function should be restarted.
 2103: 			       receive {Tester,sync} -> ok  end,
 2104: 			       put(restart, restarted);
 2105: 			   restarted ->
 2106: 			       ok
 2107: 		       end,		       
 2108: 		       mnesia:write({Tab,1,Val+10})
 2109: 	       end,
 2110:     Lucky    = fun() -> 
 2111: 		       [{Tab,1,Val}] = mnesia:read({Tab,1}),
 2112: 		       mnesia:write({Tab,1,Val+100})
 2113: 	       end,
 2114:     
 2115:     CPid = spawn_link(fun() -> Tester ! {self(), mnesia:transaction(Conflict)} end),
 2116:     
 2117:     %% sync first transaction
 2118:     receive {pid_1, CPid} -> synced end,
 2119: 
 2120:     DeleteRes(Tab, Where2Read),
 2121: 
 2122:     ?match(Keep, mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read)),
 2123:     
 2124:     %% Run the other/Lucky transaction, this should work since 
 2125:     %% it won't grab a lock on the conflicting transactions Where2Read node.
 2126:     
 2127:     LPid = spawn_link(Keep, fun() -> Tester ! {self(),mnesia:transaction(Lucky)} end),
 2128:     ?match_receive({LPid,{atomic,ok}}),
 2129:     
 2130:     %% Continue Transaction no 1
 2131:     CPid ! {self(), sync},
 2132:     
 2133:     ?match(ok, receive {CPid,{atomic,ok}} -> ok after 2000 -> process_info(self()) end),
 2134:     
 2135:     ?match({atomic,[{del_res,1,111}]}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab,1}) end)),
 2136:     Where2Read.
 2137: 
 2138: nasty(suite) -> [];
 2139: 
 2140: nasty(doc) ->
 2141:     ["Tries to fulfill a rather nasty locking scenario, where we have had "
 2142:      "bugs, the testcase tries a combination of locks in locker queue"];
 2143: 
 2144: %%  This testcase no longer works as it was intended to show errors when 
 2145: %%  tablelocks was allowed to be placed in the queue though locks existed 
 2146: %%  in the queue with less Tid's. This is no longer allowed and the testcase
 2147: %%  has been update.
 2148: 
 2149: nasty(Config) ->
 2150:     ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2151:     Tab = nasty,
 2152:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [])),    
 2153:     Coord = self(),        				    
 2154:     Write = fun(Key) ->
 2155: 		    mnesia:write({Tab, Key, write}),	 
 2156: 		    Coord ! {write, Key, self(), mnesia:get_activity_id()},
 2157: 		    receive 
 2158: 			continue ->
 2159: 			    ok
 2160: 		    end,	    
 2161: 		    Coord ! {done, {write, Key}, self()}		    
 2162: 	    end,
 2163:     
 2164:     Update = fun(Key) ->
 2165: 		     Coord ! {update, Key, self(), mnesia:get_activity_id()},
 2166: 		     receive
 2167: 			 continue ->
 2168: 			     ok
 2169: 		     end,
 2170: 		     mnesia:read({Tab, Key}),
 2171: 		     mnesia:write({Tab, Key, update}),
 2172: 		     receive
 2173: 			 continue ->
 2174: 			     ok
 2175: 		     end,
 2176: 		     
 2177: 		     Coord ! {done, {update, Key}, self()}
 2178: 	     end,
 2179:     
 2180:     TabLock = fun() ->
 2181: 		      Coord ! {tablock, Tab, self(), mnesia:get_activity_id()},
 2182: 		      receive
 2183: 			  continue ->
 2184: 			      ok
 2185: 		      end,
 2186: 		      mnesia:lock({table, Tab}, write),
 2187: 		      Coord ! {done, {tablock, Tab}, self()}
 2188: 	      end,
 2189: 
 2190:     Up = spawn_link(mnesia, transaction, [Update,  [0]]),
 2191:     ?match_receive({update, 0, Up, _Tid}),
 2192:     TL = spawn_link(mnesia, transaction, [TabLock]), 
 2193:     ?match_receive({tablock, Tab, _Tl, _Tid}),
 2194:     W0 = spawn_link(mnesia, transaction, [Write, [0]]), 
 2195:     ?match_receive({write, 0, W0, _Tid}),
 2196:     W1 = spawn_link(mnesia, transaction, [Write, [1]]), 
 2197:     ?match_receive({write, 1, W1, _Tid}),
 2198:     
 2199:     %% Nothing should be in msg queue!
 2200:     ?match(timeout, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2201:     Up ! continue,  %% Should be queued
 2202:     ?match(timeout, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2203:     TL ! continue,  %% Should be restarted
 2204: %    ?match({tablock, _, _, _}, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2205:     ?match(timeout, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2206:     
 2207:     LQ1 = mnesia_locker:get_lock_queue(),    
 2208:     ?match({2, _}, {length(LQ1), LQ1}),
 2209:     W0 ! continue,                          % Up should be in queue
 2210:     ?match_receive({done, {write, 0}, W0}),
 2211:     ?match_receive({'EXIT', W0, normal}),
 2212: 
 2213:     TL ! continue,   % Should stay in queue W1
 2214:     ?match(timeout, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2215:     Up ! continue,   % Should stay in queue (TL got higher tid)
 2216:     ?match(timeout, receive A -> A after 1000 -> timeout end),
 2217: 
 2218:     LQ2 = mnesia_locker:get_lock_queue(),
 2219:     ?match({2, _}, {length(LQ2), LQ2}),    
 2220:     
 2221:     W1 ! continue,
 2222:     ?match_receive({done, {write, 1}, W1}),
 2223:     get_exit(W1),
 2224:     get_exit(TL),
 2225:     ?match_receive({done, {tablock,Tab}, TL}),
 2226:     get_exit(Up),
 2227:     ?match_receive({done, {update, 0}, Up}),
 2228:     
 2229:     ok.
 2230: 
 2231: get_exit(Pid) ->
 2232:     receive 
 2233: 	{'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
 2234: 	    ok
 2235:     after 10000 ->
 2236: 	    ?error("Timeout EXIT ~p~n", [Pid])
 2237:     end.
 2238: 
 2239: 
 2240: foldl(doc) ->
 2241:     [""];
 2242: foldl(suite) ->
 2243:     [];
 2244: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2245:     Nodes = [_,N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2246:     Tab1 = foldl_local,
 2247:     Tab2 = foldl_remote,
 2248:     Tab3 = foldl_ordered, 
 2249:     Tab11 = foldr_local,
 2250:     Tab21 = foldr_remote,
 2251:     Tab31 = foldr_ordered, 
 2252:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2253:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies, [N2]}, {type, bag}])),
 2254:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2255: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),    
 2256:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab11, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2257:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab21, [{ram_copies, [N2]}, {type, bag}])),
 2258:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab31, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2259: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),    
 2260: 
 2261: 
 2262:     Tab1Els = [{Tab1, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2263:     Tab2Els = [{Tab2, 1, 2} | [{Tab2, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]],
 2264:     Tab3Els = [{Tab3, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2265:     Tab11Els = [{Tab11, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2266:     Tab21Els = [{Tab21, 1, 2} | [{Tab21, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]],
 2267:     Tab31Els = [{Tab31, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2268:     
 2269:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab1Els],
 2270:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab2Els],
 2271:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab3Els],
 2272:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab11Els],
 2273:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab21Els],
 2274:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab31Els],
 2275:     
 2276:     Get = fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end,
 2277:     
 2278:     %% Before 
 2279:     AddB = fun(Tab, Func) -> 
 2280: 		   mnesia:write({Tab, 0, 0}),
 2281: 		   mnesia:write({Tab, 1, 0}),
 2282: 		   mnesia:write({Tab, 11, 0}),
 2283: 		   mnesia:Func(Get, [], Tab)
 2284: 	   end,        
 2285:     AddT1 = [{Tab1, 0, 0}, {Tab1, 1, 0}] ++ tl(Tab1Els) ++ [{Tab1, 11, 0}],
 2286:     AddT2 = lists:sort([{Tab2, 0, 0}, {Tab2, 1, 0}] ++ Tab2Els ++ [{Tab2, 11, 0}]),
 2287:     AddT3 = [{Tab3, 0, 0}, {Tab3, 1, 0}] ++ tl(Tab3Els) ++ [{Tab3, 11, 0}],
 2288:     AddT11 = [{Tab11, 0, 0}, {Tab11, 1, 0}] ++ tl(Tab11Els) ++ [{Tab11, 11, 0}],
 2289:     AddT21 = lists:sort([{Tab21, 0, 0}, {Tab21, 1, 0}] ++ Tab21Els ++ [{Tab21, 11, 0}]),
 2290:     AddT31 = [{Tab31, 0, 0}, {Tab31, 1, 0}] ++ tl(Tab31Els) ++ [{Tab31, 11, 0}],
 2291:     
 2292:     ?match({atomic, AddT1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab1, foldl]))),
 2293:     ?match({atomic, AddT2}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab2, foldl]))),
 2294:     ?match({atomic, AddT3}, rev_res(mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab3, foldl]))),
 2295:     ?match({atomic, AddT11}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab11, foldr]))),
 2296:     ?match({atomic, AddT21}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab21, foldr]))),
 2297:     ?match({atomic, AddT31}, mnesia:transaction(AddB, [Tab31, foldr])),
 2298:     
 2299:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(copy, [{ram_copies, [N2]},
 2300: 						    {record_name, Tab1}])),
 2301:     CopyRec = fun(NewRec, Acc) -> 
 2302: 		      %% OTP-5495
 2303: 		      W = fun() -> mnesia:write(copy, NewRec, write), [NewRec| Acc] end,
 2304: 		      {atomic,Res} = sort_res(mnesia:transaction(W)),
 2305: 		      Res
 2306: 	      end,
 2307:     Copy = fun() -> 
 2308: 		   AddT1 = mnesia:foldl(CopyRec, [], Tab1),
 2309: 		   AddT1 = sort_res(mnesia:foldl(Get, [], copy))
 2310: 	   end,
 2311:     ?match({atomic, AddT1}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Copy))),
 2312:     
 2313:     Del  = fun(E, A) -> mnesia:delete_object(E), [E|A] end,
 2314:     DelD = fun(Tab) ->
 2315: 		   mnesia:write({Tab, 12, 12}),
 2316: 		   mnesia:delete({Tab, 0}),
 2317: 		   mnesia:foldr(Del, [], Tab),
 2318: 		   mnesia:foldl(Get, [], Tab)
 2319: 	   end,
 2320:     ?match({atomic, []}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(DelD, [Tab1]))),
 2321:     ?match({atomic, []}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(DelD, [Tab2]))),
 2322:     ?match({atomic, []}, rev_res(mnesia:transaction(DelD, [Tab3]))),
 2323:     
 2324:     ListWrite = fun(Tab) ->   %% OTP-3893 
 2325: 			mnesia:write({Tab, [12], 12}),	
 2326: 			mnesia:foldr(Get, [], Tab)
 2327: 		end,
 2328:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab1, [12], 12}]}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(ListWrite, [Tab1]))),
 2329:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab2, [12], 12}]}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(ListWrite, [Tab2]))),
 2330:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab3, [12], 12}]}, rev_res(mnesia:transaction(ListWrite, [Tab3]))),
 2331:     
 2332:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).	   
 2333: 
 2334: sort_res({atomic, List}) when is_list(List) ->
 2335:     {atomic, lists:sort(List)};
 2336: sort_res(Else) when is_list(Else) ->
 2337:     lists:sort(Else);
 2338: sort_res(Else) ->
 2339:     Else.
 2340: 
 2341: rev_res({atomic, List}) ->
 2342:     {atomic, lists:reverse(List)};
 2343: rev_res(Else) ->
 2344:     Else.
 2345: 
 2346: 
 2347: first_next(doc) ->    [""];
 2348: first_next(suite) ->  [];
 2349: first_next(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2350:     Nodes = [_,N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2351:     Tab1 = local,
 2352:     Tab2 = remote,
 2353:     Tab3 = ordered, 
 2354:     Tab4 = bag,
 2355:     Tabs = [Tab1,Tab2,Tab3,Tab4],
 2356:     
 2357:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2358:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies, [N2]}])),
 2359:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2360: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),
 2361:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab4, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2362: 						    {type, bag}])),
 2363: 
 2364:     %% Some Helpers
 2365:     Trans = fun(Fun) -> mnesia:transaction(Fun) end,
 2366:     Continue = fun(first) -> next;
 2367: 		  (last) -> prev
 2368: 	       end,
 2369:     LoopHelp = fun('$end_of_table',_,_,_Fun) -> [];
 2370: 		  (Key,Tab,Op,Fun) -> 
 2371: 		       Next = mnesia:Op(Tab,Key),
 2372: 		       [Next |Fun(Next,Tab,Op,Fun)] 
 2373: 	       end,
 2374:     Loop = fun(Tab,Start) -> 
 2375: 		   First = mnesia:Start(Tab),
 2376: 		   Res = [First|LoopHelp(First,Tab,Continue(Start),LoopHelp)],
 2377: 		   case mnesia:table_info(Tab, type) of
 2378: 		       ordered_set when Start == first -> Res;
 2379: 		       ordered_set -> 
 2380: 			   {L1,L2} = lists:split(length(Res)-1,Res),
 2381: 			   lists:reverse(L1) ++ L2;
 2382: 		       _ -> lists:sort(Res)
 2383: 		   end	  
 2384: 	   end,
 2385: 
 2386:     %% Verify empty tables
 2387:     [?match({atomic, ['$end_of_table']}, 
 2388:  	    Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2389:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2390:     [?match({atomic, ['$end_of_table']}, 
 2391:  	    Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2392:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2393:     %% Verify that trans write is visible inside trans
 2394:     [?match({atomic, [0,10,'$end_of_table']}, 
 2395:  	    Trans(fun() ->
 2396:  			  mnesia:write({Tab,0,0}),
 2397:  			  mnesia:write({Tab,10,10}),
 2398:  			  Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2399:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2400:     [?match({atomic, ['$end_of_table']}, 
 2401:  	    Trans(fun() -> 
 2402:  			  mnesia:delete({Tab,0}),
 2403:  			  mnesia:delete({Tab,10}),
 2404:  			  Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2405:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2406: 
 2407:     [?match({atomic, [0,10,'$end_of_table']}, 
 2408:  	    Trans(fun() -> 
 2409:  			  mnesia:write({Tab,0,0}),
 2410:  			  mnesia:write({Tab,10,10}),
 2411:  			  Loop(Tab,last) end))
 2412:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2413:     [?match({atomic, ['$end_of_table']}, 
 2414:  	    Trans(fun() -> 
 2415:  			  mnesia:delete({Tab,0}),
 2416:  			  mnesia:delete({Tab,10}),
 2417:  			  Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2418:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2419: 
 2420:     Tab1Els = [{Tab1, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
 2421:     Tab2Els = [{Tab2, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
 2422:     Tab3Els = [{Tab3, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 5)],
 2423:     Tab4Els = [{Tab4, 1, 2} | [{Tab4, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 5)]],
 2424: 
 2425:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab1Els],
 2426:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab2Els],
 2427:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab3Els],
 2428:     [mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab4Els],
 2429:     Keys = lists:sort(mnesia:dirty_all_keys(Tab1)),
 2430:     R1  =  Keys++ ['$end_of_table'],
 2431:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2432:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2433: 
 2434:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2435:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2436:     R2 = R1 -- [3],
 2437: 
 2438:     [?match({atomic, R2}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab,3}),Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2439:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2440:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab,3,3}),Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2441:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2442:     [?match({atomic, R2}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab,3}),Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2443:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2444:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab,3,3}),Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2445:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2446:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab,4,19}),Loop(Tab,first) end)) 
 2447:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2448:     [?match({atomic, R1}, Trans(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab,4,4}),Loop(Tab,last) end)) 
 2449:      || Tab <- Tabs],
 2450: 
 2451:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2452: 
 2453: 
 2454: snmp_shadows(doc) ->    [""];
 2455: snmp_shadows(suite) ->  [];
 2456: snmp_shadows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2457:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2458:     Tab = snmp_shadows,
 2459:     io:format("With fixstring~n", []),
 2460:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab,[{snmp,[{key,{fix_string,integer}}]}])),
 2461:     snmp_shadows_test(Tab),
 2462:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 2463:     io:format("Without fixstring~n", []),
 2464:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab,[{snmp,[{key,{string,integer}}]}])),
 2465:     snmp_shadows_test(Tab),
 2466:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2467: 
 2468: snmp_shadows_test(Tab) ->
 2469:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {"string", N}, {N, init}}) || N <- lists:seq(2,8,2)],
 2470:     
 2471:     CheckOrder = fun(A={_,_,{_,_,State}}, Prev) ->
 2472: 			 ?match({true, A, Prev}, {Prev < A, A, Prev}),
 2473: 			 {State,A} 
 2474: 		 end,
 2475:     R1 = mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> loop_snmp(Tab, []) end),
 2476:     lists:mapfoldl(CheckOrder, {[],foo,foo}, R1),
 2477:     R2 = mnesia:transaction(fun() -> loop_snmp(Tab, []) end),
 2478:     ?match({atomic, R1}, R2),
 2479:     
 2480:     Shadow = fun() ->
 2481: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",1}, {1,update}}),
 2482: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",4}, {4,update}}),
 2483: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",6}, {6,update}}),
 2484: 		     ok = mnesia:delete({Tab, {"string",6}}),
 2485: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",9}, {9,update}}),
 2486: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",3}, {3,update}}),
 2487: 		     ok = mnesia:write({Tab, {"string",5}, {5,update}}),
 2488: 		     [Row5] = mnesia:read({Tab, {"string",5}}),
 2489: 		     ok = mnesia:delete_object(Row5),
 2490: 		     loop_snmp(Tab, [])
 2491: 	     end,
 2492:     R3 = mnesia:sync_dirty(Shadow),
 2493:     {L3,_} = lists:mapfoldl(CheckOrder, {[],foo,foo}, R3),
 2494:     ?match([{1,update},{2,init},{3,update},{4,update},{8,init},{9,update}], L3),
 2495:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
 2496: 
 2497:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {"string", N}, {N, init}}) || N <- lists:seq(2,8,2)],
 2498:     {atomic, R3} = mnesia:transaction(Shadow),
 2499:     {L4,_} = lists:mapfoldl(CheckOrder, {[],foo,foo}, R3),
 2500:     ?match([{1,update},{2,init},{3,update},{4,update},{8,init},{9,update}], L4),
 2501:     ok.
 2502:    
 2503: loop_snmp(Tab,Prev) ->
 2504:     case mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab,Prev) of
 2505: 	{ok, SKey} ->
 2506: 	    {{ok,Row},_} = {mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab, SKey),{?LINE,Prev,SKey}},
 2507: 	    {{ok,MKey},_} = {mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab,SKey),{?LINE,Prev,SKey}},
 2508: 	    ?match({[Row],Row,SKey,MKey}, {mnesia:read({Tab,MKey}),Row,SKey,MKey}),
 2509: 	    [{SKey, MKey, Row} | loop_snmp(Tab, SKey)];
 2510: 	endOfTable ->
 2511: 	    []
 2512:     end.
